attributes.action: Make November and December the council tax payment free months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council tax is paid 10 months out of 12 months. The months which is not normally paid are February and March.

I think the payment free months should be November and December as the amount of money generated in two months' of council tax payments is £150-£600 - this money can make the difference of not being able to celebrate Christmas and making a Christmas memorable.
